attributes.action: Let Muslim Students in Schools pray during school hours.
attributes.additional_details: I am a Muslim Student in a School but can’t follow the rules of my religion to pray 5 times a day. My school won’t allow the fact that I need to pray so I’m asking for the government to help not just me,but many other students out there who want to pray!
attributes.background: I want the Government to take into account that religion and belief is a big thing in society and can impact one’s life greatly.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646079

If you are unhappy about your school's policy on prayer you should raise this with your parents or a teacher.
